snippet: Petter Northug of Norway edged Dario Cologna of Switzerland to win a 10-kilometer classic-style and 10K freestyle skiathlon in the Tour de Ski cross-country series in Oberstdorf, Germany.
lead_paragraph: Petter Northug of Norway edged Dario Cologna of Switzerland to win a 10-kilometer classic-style and 10K freestyle skiathlon in the Tour de Ski cross-country series in Oberstdorf, Germany.
